attributes.action: Say NO to a second EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: There should be no second referendum just because those who voted in are unhappy.
attributes.background: The Citizens of the Great Britain were given the chance to vote IN or OUT of Europe on 23rd June 2016 and had plenty of warning. Those who did not vote were obviously not interested in whether Britain remained or left Europe. The majority voted to leave Europe and that was the winning vote.
